text.headline: Oops Timeline
text.text: Events, statements, laws, rulings that may have been regretted ☞

text.headline: Claim: US Declines offer to expand N95 manufacture
text.text: "January [2020], Department of Health and Human Services officials effectively dismissed an offer from one of America’s few remaining N95 manufacturers, Prestige Ameritech, to expand its production lines". Via @AbraarKaran
